channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stock futures rise as investors try to recover from tech-driven sell-off: Live updates
item.description: Stocks sold off in Tuesday’s regular session, spurred by profit-taking in Big Tech names and worries about the Federal Reserve’s rate cuts.

item.title: Generation Beta is here — and you won’t believe how much today’s newborns will need to retire
item.description: Babies born in 2025 could face a major shortfall in savings in 75 years if things don’t change. Here’s what families can do now to prepare.

item.title: ‘I’ve always been very good with money’: Should I put my wife on the title of my home, investment property and my late father’s house?
item.description: “If I die and she sells the properties, would she have to pay a lot of capital-gains taxes, especially on the houses we don’t live in?”

item.description: European markets traded higher Wednesday as investors assessed the region's economic outlook.

item.title: Delta links its loyalty program to Uber, ending partnership with Lyft
item.description: Starting this spring, Delta SkyMiles members will be able to earn loyalty points for Uber rides.

item.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman denies sexual abuse allegations made by his sister in lawsuit
item.description: In a lawsuit filed in Missouri, Sam Altman's sister has accused the OpenAI CEO of years of sexual abuse. Altman denied the claims.
